Code Enforcement
================

[Home](https://www.horizoncity.org/)Code Enforcement

Code Enforcement Department
---------------------------

The Code Enforcement Department is in charge of investigating complaints and enforcement for city Ordinance Violations for Horizon City. If you have questions on a recent notice or would like to report an ordinance violation please call 915-852-1046.

**CITY ORDINANCES:**

Garage Sale Permits:

* [Garage Sale Permit Application](//www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Sale-Yard.Garage.Porch_.Patio_.Estate-Sign-011315.pdf)
* [Regulations & Restrictions Affecting Signs: Ordinance #0091](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/ORDINANCE-NO.-91-Sign-Regs-with-Amd-No.-11.pdf)
* [Verbiage on Permit Issuance & Fee If No Permit Obtained: Ordinance #0102](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/REFORMATTED-ConsolidatedOrd-102-91-1.pdf)

Parking:

* [Regulating Parking: Ordinance #0093](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Ordinance-93-Parking1.pdf)

Noise Nuisance:

* [Noise Nuisance: Ordinance #0049](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Ord-0049-Noise-Ordinance.pdf)

Weeds/Rubbish:

* [Weeds/Rubbish Nuisance: Ordinance #0017](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Nuisance-0017-Adopted-081313.pdf)

Storm Water Management:

* Curb and Gutter Maintnance

Sightline View:

* Sightline Standards: Ordinance #0102
* Cars, Shurbs, Branches: Obstruction on Sidewalk
* Blocked by Vehicle (ADA): Side Walk

Animal Nuisance:

* [Animal Control](http://www.epcounty.com/sheriff/soanimalcontrolunit.htm)
* [Animal Ordinance: Ordinance #0220](http://www.horizoncity.org/content/files/Ord%200220%20-%20Animal%20Ordinances%281%29.pdf)

Security Alarms:

* [Regulating Security Alarm Systems & False Alarms: Ordinance #0103](http://www.horizoncity.org/wp-content/uploads/Ordinance-0103-Security-Alarm-Systems.pdf)
